snippet.title: [Puzzle Juggle Trouble] 2-Player Co-op gameplay
snippet.description:
The update is out, go play it: https://oshisaure.itch.io/puzzle-juggle-trouble

Even though this game has been playable since the start of last year, I've been working on it again for pretty much the whole month, and I'm releasing an update tomorrow which adds more content, like this co-op gamemode. I'll have a proper trailer for the whole thing within the next couple days.

Gameplay featuring my lovely squishy boyfriend playing green pieces on controller, while I play the pink ones on keyboard. The grey is a shared piece either of us can swap to.
